original_title: American Statesman: The Nick Freitas Story
overview: Director Remso W. Martinez ("Haunted Republic" and the Remso Republic podcast) follows Virginia Delegate Nick Freitas on election day, 2017 to discover not just why this young representative is capturing national attention, but also why so many people of different life experiences are taking time out of their lives to not just push a candidate, but a vision for the future focused on liberty.
tagline: A Virginia politicians vision for the future focused on liberty
title: American Statesman: The Nick Freitas Story
